Plot: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.
Title: Stuck in Love
Actors: Greg Kinnear, Jennifer Connelly, Lily Collins, Nat Wolff
tomatoConsensus: It struggles to enliven its uneven script, but Stuck in Love boasts enough winning performances from its solid veteran cast to offer an appealing diversion for rom-com enthusiasts.
